Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Lc-LEAP2 (L. camtschaticum  liver-expressed antimicrobial peptide 2, natural AMPs, animals; UCSS1a, 2S=S)
Sequence Information.Source: muscle and supraneural body, the primitive jawless vertebrate lamprey,Lethenteron camtschaticum

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (35.21%) toDefensin-like peptide C-13326Chemical modification:  C4: 2 S-S bonds: C1-C3 and C2-C4.Activity:  displayed dose-dependent inhibition of S. aureus, S. epidermidis, E. coli and P. aeruginosa. Est.2/2024;
Literature Information.Author: Wang Y, Wang Z, Gao Z, Luan Y, Li Q, Pang Y, Gou M.2024
Literature Information.Title: Identification of antibacterial activity of liver-expressed antimicrobial peptide 2 (LEAP2) from primitive vertebrate lamprey.
